description: Effective Governance for Small Scale Rural Infrastructure and Disaster Preparedness in a Changing Climate.

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description:
-Expected Project Outcome and Indicator PPG Phase: Increased Awareness and capacity for small scale infrastructure development, disaster preparedness and ecosystems based adaptation in a changing climate
-Project Output and Indicator for PPG Phase: Full size project on "Effective Governance for small scale rural infrastructure and disaster preparedness in a changing climate"
subproject.title: Effective Governance CC Rural

title: Effective Governance Climate Change Rural Infrastructure
